amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to direct the Chairman of the Federal Communications Commission to engage tribal stakeholders and providers to ensure accessible and affordable broadband on tribal lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stanton amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Stanton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stanton amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
